title: Opinion: Instead of banning TikTok, Congress should do their actual job
description: As lawmakers spent nearly five hours grilling of TikTok chief executive Shou Zi Chew on Thursday, you could be forgiven for having a serious case of déjà vu.

title: Markets Gain, Rebounding From Wednesday's Selloff
description: U.S. stock indexes closed higher on Thursday, March 23, boosted by optimism in the technology sector, with the Nasdaq gaining 1%.

title: 〈美股盤後〉葉倫改口安撫市場 四大指數齊揚 Block挫近15%
description: 聯準會釋出升息可能接近尾聲的訊號後，美股週四 (23 日) 明顯走強，儘管盤中漲勢一度消散，美國財政部長葉倫改口安撫市場，科技股吸引逢低買盤，道瓊指數收漲超過 75 點，標準普爾 500 指數升 0.3%
